metadata.dc:description: Exist epidemiologic evidences about the relationshipamong an important number of professional exposuresthat may contribute to the genesis of a laryngeal cancer.With this article, our purpose has been to revise thoseprofessional activities with high risk for developing alaryngeal carcinoma
